keyMoments.title: Caesar Arrives at Ruined Lab
keyMoments.description: Caesar arrives at the ruined lab to retrieve the children from Nami and Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the main confrontation of the episode.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Oxygen Removal
keyMoments.description: Caesar uses his Gasu Gasu no Mi abilities to remove oxygen from the air, suffocating Nami and Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full extent of Caesar's gas manipulation abilities and his willingness to kill.
keyMoments.quote: My ability allows me to control the air itself!

keyMoments.title: First Use of Gastanet
keyMoments.description: Caesar debuts his Gastanet technique, using explosive gas-filled castanets to defeat Brownbeard.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of one of Caesar's signature combat techniques.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Nami and Usopp
keyMoments.description: Caesar uses Gastanet to knock out Nami and Usopp, securing the children.
keyMoments.significance: Caesar successfully captures the children and neutralizes the Straw Hats protecting them.

keyMoments.title: Broadcasts to New World Brokers
keyMoments.description: Caesar sends a televised message to underworld brokers announcing his weapon of mass destruction.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the weapons demonstration and reveals the criminal underworld network.
keyMoments.quote: I'm selling a weapon of mass destruction that the Marines wish they had!

abilities.description: Caesar removes oxygen from the air around his targets, suffocating them.
Caesar fills castanets with explosive gas and claps them together to create a massive explosion.

reveals.information: Can remove oxygen from air to suffocate opponents
Uses Gastanet technique with explosive gas castanets

keyMoments.title: Saves Nami and Usopp, Confronts Caesar
keyMoments.description: Brownbeard appears to save Nami and Usopp from the children and confronts Caesar, demanding his crew back after realizing Caesar's betrayal.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Brownbeard's moral turning point from loyal subordinate to someone who recognizes and opposes Caesar's evil.
keyMoments.quote: I want my crew back, Caesar!

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Caesar's Gastanet
keyMoments.description: Brownbeard attempts to fight Caesar but is quickly defeated by the Gastanet explosion.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that despite his moral growth, Brownbeard lacks the power to stop Caesar.

relationships.description: Brownbeard realizes Caesar has betrayed him and his crew, turning against him.

evolutionMoments.description: Brownbeard confronts Caesar about his betrayal and demands his crew back.

reveals.information: Brownbeard realizes Caesar has been deceiving him about the children and his crew

keyMoments.title: Suffocated by Caesar
keyMoments.description: Nami is suffocated when Caesar removes the oxygen from the air around her and Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Caesar's willingness to kill and the danger the Straw Hats face.

keyMoments.title: Knocked Out by Gastanet
keyMoments.description: After Brownbeard's intervention, Caesar uses Gastanet to knock out both Nami and Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: The Straw Hats fail to protect the children, allowing Caesar to proceed with his plan.

keyMoments.title: Suffocated by Caesar
keyMoments.description: Usopp is suffocated when Caesar removes the oxygen from the air, neutralizing his attempt to attack.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that Usopp's ranged attacks are ineffective against Caesar's gas manipulation.

keyMoments.title: Knocked Out by Gastanet
keyMoments.description: Caesar uses Gastanet to knock out both Usopp and Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Despite their efforts, Usopp and Nami are unable to protect the children from Caesar.
